citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 AM to 11:30
AM on June 4, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by talking to the store employee and calling the
licensee's phone number. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Critical Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:20 AM to 11:30 
AM on June 4, 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by talking to the store employee and calling the 
licensee's phone number. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
